name: Speedpro
description:
A small project created by Joe Birkbeck and Declan Peach for a 3rd Year University Scripting Assignment.

http://joebirkbeck.wix.com/portfolio

http://declankpeach.wix.com/portfolio

The objective is to qualify the races in a certain time while also collecting coins and taking short cuts that can only be activated by the colour of your car

WASD and Directional keys to control.

S and Down to brake.

R to reset.
